channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CA

item.title: Report X-2023120974
item.description:
Report X-2023120974

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME FROM LOAD SIDE WET AND GIVING OFF A STRONG ODOR. ONE OF THE CONTENTS HAS A CRACK BY ITS CLOSURE DUE TO A MANUFACURER DEFECT. SPILL WAS CLEANED AND PKG PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG. CONTENTS ARE REGULATED BUT PKG HAS NO LABELS. DescribePack: ONE OF THE CONTENTS HAS A CRACK BY ITS CLOSURE DUE TO A MANUFACURER DEFECT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: SPILL WAS CLEANED AND PKG PLACED IN A HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023120963
item.description:
Report X-2023120963

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-18
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UNPROCESSED HAZMAT PACKAGE CAME FROM LOADSIDE WET AND LEAKING. PACKAGE DAMAGED DURING LOADING, DROPPED. PACKAGE DOES HAVE OVERHEAD SCANS AT SFSP. FULLY REGULATED MARKINGS WITHOUT PROPER SHIPMENT CODES AND LACK OF OP-900S. DescribePack: BOTTLE LEAKED FROM CRACKED CAP. SPILL LESS THAN TENTH OF A GALLON, ISOLATED TO PACKAGING. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG LINED DRUM.

item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-14
  • City: CITY OF INDUSTRY
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023120928 SequenceEvent: The package was 1 of 3 of the same exact product found inside its trailer wet from an internal leakage. DescribePack: 2 of 4 inner containers of Branson GP were found with loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The leaking was placed into a hazmat bag and taken to the hazmat cage. 2. X-2023120962 SequenceEvent: Package arrived to our dock on the unload leaking into the trailer. DescribePack: 2 of 4 containers were found wet and dented on the sides which caused the leakage through the caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately put into a hazmat bag and taken to the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023120957
item.description:
Report X-2023120957

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-17
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE CAME FROM LOADSIDE CRUSHED AND GIVING OFF AN ODOR OF ALCOHOL. DAMAGED IN TRANSIT, INADEQUATE BLOCK AND BRACE. ALL BOTTLES DENTED TO VARYING DEGREES. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE LEAKED A TENTH OF A GALLON FROM CRUSHED BODY AND CAP ASKEW. SPILL LONG SINCE DRIED OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG LINED DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2023120930
item.description:
Report X-2023120930

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-16
  • City: CHINO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package Handler accidentally dropped the box and caused bottle to break. Manager immediately had the package handlers working the area to clear out and vented out the area. Once area was completely vented out QA and Managers worked together to safely retrieve the box and place in vent and used absorbent to clean up rest of spill. DescribePack: top of glass bottle inside box broke completely causing the liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Area was cleared out and vented out by opening trailer doors and using fans. Source of leak was placed inside a hazmat bag with absorbent and safely taken to vent.

Report X-2023121048

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: RESPONDER WORE REQUIRED PERSONAL PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT (PPE), FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, CLEANED UP AND REMOVED THE SPILL SAFELY.

item.title: Report E-2023120413
item.description:
Report E-2023120413

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-30T17:46:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: SACRAMENTO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately .5 gallons of hydroplate 1086 part A (UN1263) released from a 5 gallon plastic bucket due to a bad pallet that broke during transport. The release impacted trailer floor. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal and it was determined that terminal personnel were capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. (1) 8 gallon poly drum was created as waste and left onsite for the terminal to manage.
